General.Name: Zhejiang Linuo Flow Control Techno
General.Description: Zhejiang Linuo Flow Control Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of fluid control equipment in China and internationally. The company offers Capping, ball, disk, knife gate, butterfly, three-piece ball, mounted, floating, and check valves. It also provides valve accessories. The company serves petrochemical, chemical, papermaking, environmental protection, energy, electric power, mining, metallurgy, petroleum, Medicine, food, and other industries. Zhejiang Linuo Flow Control Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Ruian, China.

3.Name: Mr. Huibin  Feng
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
